TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PagerSettings extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class PagerSettings Implements IStateManager
public ref class PagerSettings sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示支持分页的控件中的分页控件的属性。

span.span: Represents the properties of the paging controls in a control that supports pagination.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件 (如， ，并控件) 可以显示一组控件调用*寻呼程序*，允许用户在控件内的页面之间导航。Controls that support pagination (such as the , , and controls) can display a set of controls called *the pager* that allows the user to navigate the pages within the control. 这些控件使用类来表示的页导航属性。The class is used by these controls to represent the properties of the pager. 一般情况下，对象存储在`PagerSettings`控件的属性。In general, the object is stored in the `PagerSettings` property of the control. 可以通过设置的属性来自定义页导航对象。You can customize the pager by setting the properties of the object. 页导航支持多个不同的显示模式。The pager supports several different display modes. 若要指定要在其中显示页导航模式，请设置属性。To specify the mode in which to display the pager, set the property. 下表描述了不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一步页和下一步按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一步的页上下, 一步页、 第一页和最后一页按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last -page buttons.| ||直接编号访问页的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||带编号的链接、 链接、 第一个和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered-link, first-link, and last-link buttons.| 当属性设置为， ，或值可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性来自定义的非数字按钮的文本。When the property is set to the , , or value you can customize the text of the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||前一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一页按钮的的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||最后一页按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 或者，还可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性中显示的非数字按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 当设置 image 属性时，相应的文本属性将充当图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，当属性设置，通过指定的文本属性将显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 当属性设置为或值，可以指定的页按钮显示页导航中，通过设置的数目属性。When the property is set to the or value, you can specify the number of page buttons to display in the pager by setting the property. 可在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件显示页导航。The pager can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of a control. 若要指定的页导航位置，请设置属性。To specify the position of the pager, set the property. 若要显示或隐藏页导航，请使用属性。To show or hide the pager, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中包含的对象属性可自定义的页导航行中显示的按钮的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object that is contained in the property to customize the text of the buttons that are displayed in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的新实例类。Use the constructor to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数通常由控件开发人员提供支持时使用分页中自定义控件。The constructor generally is used by control developers when providing paging support in a custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FirstPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，可以通过设置显示的第一页按钮文本属性，而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display text for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果并属性均设置，图像将显示与属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示的页导航行中的第一页按钮的图像控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的文字。

span.span: The text to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值是"&l t;&l t;"，它将呈现为"<<"。

span.span: The default is "<<", which renders as "<<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要为第一页按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，可以通过设置显示的第一页按钮的图像属性，而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果并属性均设置，图像将显示与属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可自定义为中的页导航行的第一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the first-page button of the pager row in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置支持分页的控件中的页导航控件的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode in which to display the pager controls in a control that supports pagination.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件提供了多个模式中显示的分页控件。Controls that support pagination provide multiple modes in which to display the paging controls. 使用属性以指定的模式。Use the property to specify the mode. 下表介绍分页控件不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes for pagination controls. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一步页和下一步按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一步页、 下一页中，第一页和最后一页按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last-page buttons.| ||直接编号访问页的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||带编号和第一个链接和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered and first-link and last-link buttons.| 当属性设置为， ，或值，您可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性指定为非数字按钮的自定义文本。When the property is set to the , , or value, you can specify custom text for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||前一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一页按钮的的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||最后一页按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 或者，也可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性中显示的非数字按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 当设置 image 属性时，相应的文本属性将充当图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，当属性设置，通过指定的文本属性将显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的页导航行的控件应显示数值按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager row for a control should display numeric buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/CS/PagerSettingsNumericcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/VB/PagerSettingsNumericvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定页导航的显示位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the location where the pager is displayed.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示页导航位置。Use the property to specify the location at which to display the pager. 下表描述了不同的位置。The following table describes the different positions. |PositionPosition|位置Location| |--------------|--------------| ||控件的底部。The bottom of the control.| ||该控件的顶部。The top of the control.| ||在顶部和底部的控件上。At both the top and bottom of the control.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在底部显示的页导航行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the pager row at the bottom of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要为前一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，可以通过设置显示前一页按钮的文本属性，而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display text for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果并属性均设置，图像将显示与属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示前一页按钮的图像中的页导航行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the previous-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 默认值是"&l t;"，它将呈现为"<"。

span.span: The default is "<", which renders as "<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要为前一页按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，可以通过设置显示为前一页按钮图像属性，而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果并属性均设置，图像将显示与属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可自定义为中的页导航行的前一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager row in a control. summary.span: 当 对象的属性更改值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a property of a object changes values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的每次都会引发事件对象的值更改。The event is raised each time a property of a object changes values. 事件通常由支持分页的页导航设置更改时重新绑定到控件的数据的数据绑定控件。The event commonly is used by data-bound controls that support pagination to rebind the data to the control when the pager settings change. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否支持分页的控件中显示分页控件。Use the property to specify whether the paging controls are displayed in a control that supports pagination. 若要隐藏的分页控件，设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the paging controls, set the property to `false`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏页导航行时控件处于编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the pager row when a control is in edit mode.
